modName: K K Instant Spells - No Charge Time
summary: This changes the charge time of all spells to 0.
descriptionHtml:
04/24/14 Added a Midas version

If you're like me, and want your spells to be instantaneous without a charge time, then this is the mod for you.

This mod doesn't require any DLC, since I only changed the vanilla spells. (I can however, make a DLC compatible mode if it gets requested.)
PS: this is my first mod

Installation:
Just copy the .esp file to your skyrim/data folder and you're good to go

Known bugs (if anyone knows how to fix them please contact me):
Lighting spells seem to stop working if used many times in a small amount of time
Destruction skill doesnt level up when using spells that have been modified by this mod
author: K K
